Package com.mozilla.secops.authprofile

Pipeline for authentication source profiling and alerting

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthProfile.AuthProfileOptions
    Runtime options for AuthProfile pipeline.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthProfile
    AuthProfile implements analysis of normalized authentication events to detect authentication for a given user from an unknown source IP address.
    AuthProfile.Analyze
    Analyze grouped events for a given user, generating alert messages based on the contents of the authentication event.
    AuthProfile.ParseAndWindow
    Composite transform to parse a PCollection containing events as strings and emit a PCollection of KV objects where the key is a particular username and the value is a list of authentication events seen for that user within the window.
    StateModel
    Manages and stores state for a given user

Package com.mozilla.secops.authprofile Description

Pipeline for authentication source profiling and alerting
